summary: Frontend testing completed for Fear Meter major feature additions. All 5 new features are working correctly: Movie Session Mode, VR Experience, Fear Challenge, Biometric Profile, and Fear Sharing. All new routes load properly and all menu items are accessible from the side menu.
critical_code_review_comments: All new components follow consistent design patterns with clinical color palette (#8E0E1C)
Each feature properly displays SIMULATED/DEMO disclaimers
localStorage used appropriately for profile persistence
All routes properly configured in App.js
Side menu updated with all new navigation items
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 5 new features tested and working. This is a frontend-only horror simulation app with all biometric data MOCKED/SIMULATED. No real VR/biometric integration - all simulations.

features_tested.movie_session_shows_movies: PASS - Shows 4 horror movies (Hereditary, The Conjuring, Sinister, Insidious) with fear events and fear levels
features_tested.movie_session_fear_levels: PASS - EXTREME and HIGH fear level badges displayed
features_tested.vr_experience_connect_button: PASS - 'CONNECT VR HEADSET' button visible and functional
features_tested.vr_experience_connection_simulation: PASS - Connection states (DISCONNECTED → SEARCHING → CONNECTING → CONNECTED) work correctly
features_tested.vr_experience_start_button: PASS - 'START VR EXPERIENCE' button appears after connection
features_tested.fear_challenge_endurance_mode: PASS - ENDURANCE mode visible with description 'Keep BPM under 100 as long as possible'
features_tested.fear_challenge_extreme_mode: PASS - EXTREME mode visible with description 'Keep BPM under 90 — maximum difficulty'
features_tested.fear_challenge_leaderboard: PASS - Global leaderboard shows 10 entries with rank, name, country, score, time
features_tested.biometric_profile_generate_button: PASS - 'GENERATE PROFILE' button visible and functional
features_tested.biometric_profile_radar_chart: PASS - Fear Sensitivity Radar chart displays 6 attributes after generation
features_tested.biometric_profile_breakdown: PASS - Sensitivity Breakdown shows bars for Jump Scare, Psychological, Gore, Supernatural, Tension, Darkness
features_tested.fear_sharing_card_preview: PASS - Shareable card preview with FEAR METER CERTIFIED badge, movie name, BPM, fear score, QR code
features_tested.fear_sharing_templates: PASS - 3 card templates available (SURVIVAL CARD, EXTREME FEAR, FEARLESS)
features_tested.fear_sharing_customization: PASS - Movie selection, Peak BPM slider, Fear Score slider all functional
features_tested.fear_sharing_share_buttons: PASS - COPY SHARE LINK, TWITTER, INSTAGRAM, SAVE buttons present
features_tested.side_menu_new_items: PASS - All 5 new menu items accessible (Movie Session, VR Experience, Fear Challenge, Biometric Profile, Share Fear)

mocked_apis.note: All biometric and fear data is SIMULATED - no real APIs
mocked_apis.bpm_simulation: MOCKED - Values simulated in each component
mocked_apis.vr_connection: MOCKED - Simulated connection states with timeouts
mocked_apis.profile_generation: MOCKED - Random values generated in BiometricProfile.jsx
mocked_apis.movie_timelines: MOCKED - Static timeline data in MovieSession.jsx
